name: Suli Amir
summary: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs.
description:
You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs. You can cast read omens and 4th-level invisibility each once per day as arcane innate spells, and you can cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate cantrip, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.Traits

Suli: Sulis are planar scions descended from jann.

Uncommon: Something of uncommon rarity requires special training or comes from a particular culture or part of the world. Some character choices give access to uncommon options, and the GM can choose to allow access for anyone. Less is known about uncommon creatures than common creatures. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creature is increased by 2.
